query: NorthWind Health Insurance Plan provides comprehensive medical coverage for employees and their dependents. The plan includes preventive care services, routine check-ups, specialist consultations, prescription drug coverage, and emergency room visits. Annual wellness exams are fully covered with no co-payment. The plan features a $1,500 individual deductible and $3,000 family deductible. In-network providers offer the best cost savings with 80/20 coinsurance after deductible. Mental health services and telehealth options are included at no additional cost.

NorthWind Health Insurance Plan offers extensive medical coverage including preventive care, specialist visits, and prescription benefits. Coverage includes routine examinations, diagnostic testing, and hospitalization services. The plan has a $1,500 individual deductible with 80/20 coinsurance. However, please note the following exclusions: cosmetic procedures, experimental treatments, fertility treatments, weight loss programs, and alternative medicine therapies such as acupuncture or chiropractic care beyond 12 visits annually. Dental and vision services are not included in this plan and require separate enrollment.

The NorthWind Dental Plan covers preventive services including cleanings, exams, and x-rays at 100%. Basic procedures such as fillings and extractions are covered at 80% after a $50 deductible. Major services including crowns, bridges, and root canals are covered at 50%. The annual maximum benefit is $2,000 per person. All services must be provided by in-network dentists for coverage to apply.

NorthWind offers a comprehensive employee benefits package including health, dental, and vision insurance. The health plan covers hospital stays, outpatient procedures, and preventive care. Exclusions apply to cosmetic surgery, elective procedures not medically necessary, experimental drugs, and treatments outside the approved formulary. Over-the-counter medications and vitamins are not covered unless prescribed by a physician.

The standard NorthWind health plan provides full coverage for annual physicals, immunizations, and preventive screenings with no cost-sharing. Emergency and urgent care services are covered with a $150 copay. Prescription drugs are available through the mail-order pharmacy or retail locations with tiered copayments: $10 generic, $30 preferred brand, $60 non-preferred brand. The out-of-pocket maximum is $5,000 individual and $10,000 family per calendar year.
